name: James Cagney Movies Quiz | Celebrities | 10 Questions

questions.text: In 'Yankee Doodle Dandy', who did Cagney play?
questions.explanation:
George M. Cohan

	His favorite role.

questions.text: Which movie about boxing featured Cagney?
questions.explanation:
'City for Conquest'.

	Good movie. With Arthur Kennedy. 'Soul' was John Garfield. 'Champion' was Kirk Douglas. 'Somebody' was Paul Newman. All pretty decent movies.

questions.text: '13 Rue Madeleine' is set during what war?

questions.explanation:
Mister Roberts.

	The captain. With Fonda and Lemmon.

questions.text: 'Love Me or Leave Me' featured Cagney in a good dramatic role. Who was his co-star?
questions.explanation:
Doris Day.

	Story of Ruth Etting.

questions.text: Which movie had Cagney in the cast?
questions.explanation:
'A Midsummer Night's Dream'.

	Early in his career.

questions.text: Who co-starred with Cagney in 'White Heat'?
questions.explanation:
Virginia Mayo.

	Based on Ma Barker?

questions.text: Which movie helped launch Cagney's career?
questions.explanation:
'The Public Enemy'.

	'Caesar' was Edward G.Robinson. 'Dahlia' was Alan Ladd. 'Lovely' was Dick Powell.

questions.text: Which is NOT a Cagney movie?
questions.explanation:
'The Mountain'.

	'Mountain' was with Spencer Tracy. 'Lion' was a political story. 'Badman' was a western. 'West Point' was a musical comedy.

questions.text: Cagney came out of retirement for a role in what movie?
questions.explanation:
'Ragtime'.

	James Cagney made 'Ragtime' when he was 82 years old.  It was his last film appearance.
